content: Add Stripe API keys and JWT secret to backend .env file
Build complete backend with JWT auth, MongoDB models, CRUD endpoints, Stripe integration, and seed data
Create design tokens in index.css per design guidelines (CSS variables)
Build complete frontend with app shell, routing, all pages (Login, Dashboard, Projects, Clients, Invoices, Payments), and API integration
Restart backend and frontend services via supervisorctl
Test frontend compilation with esbuild and check service logs
Take screenshots and verify UI matches design guidelines
Run comprehensive testing via testing agent
